content: AG 450-7S Angle grinder Slim, powerful angle grinder with side switch, for discs up to 4.5 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ergonomically designed tool for universal use in cutting and grinding Low-profile design for easier access to tight spaces Comfortable and convenient to use Low tool weight – supports precise and continuous operation Designed for working comfort – less tiring to use over long periods Applications Preparing and finishing welds and surfaces Grinding and cutting metal, concrete or masonry Deburring and polishing metal ### TECHNICAL DATA: Disc diameter: 4-17/32 in Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 4.4 lb. Max. cutting depth: 0.94 in Technical Data | Disc diameter | 4-17/32 in | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 4.4 lb | Max. cutting depth | 0.94 in | Trigger type | lockable on / off | Disclaimer | Use specific guard depending on selected disc ### ITEMS- 3554361 - ANGLE GRINDER AG 450-7S - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x AG 450-7S 120V Angle grinder - 1x M14 / 5/8 Installation wrench - 1x XSAG Comfort side handle - 1x Ø115 Protective cover - 1x Ø 45 / 5/8 Flange - 1x Nut - 1x 4-1/2 grinding guard
